```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(base)

library(scales)
library(ggridges)
library(patchwork)
library(ggseqlogo)
library(dplyr)
library(table1)
```

## Clean data

```{r}
#copy paste
rhc_clean <- rhc_data |> 
  bind_cols() |> 
  as_tibble() 

# convert death string to binary: 1 = dead 0 = alive
rhc_clean <- rhc_clean |> 
  mutate(death = case_when(
  death == "No" ~ 0,
  death == "Yes" ~ 1))

#round age to the nearest whole number
rhc_clean <- rhc_clean |> rename(weight = wtkilo1) |> 
                          mutate(age = round(age, 0),
                                 weight = round(weight, 0),
                                 edu = round(edu, 0),
                                 temp1 = round(temp1, 1),
                                 ph1 = round(ph1, 2))

#change Ptid to ID and move to first spot
rhc_clean <- rhc_clean |> 
                select(-ptid) |> 
                rename(ptID= "...1")
  

rhc_clean

          

```

## Save data

```{r}
# Write the data to disk
write_csv(x = rhc_clean,
          file = "data/rhc_clean.csv")

```
